name: El Rey del Mundo (Non Cuban) - Reserva Nicaragua - Robusto
brand: El Rey del Mundo (Non Cuban), Reserva Nicaragua
additionalNotes: This beautifully constructed cigar bears stunning a wrapper of the oiliest Honduran sun-grown leaf cultivated in Olancho San Agustín (or OSA). This region is famous for its perfect tropical climate that results in exceptionally fertile soil, which in turn yields lush, thick tobacco leaf. This fine wrapper covers hand-selected filler tobaccos from Honduras and the rich volcanic growing regions of Nicaragua. This wonderful cigar starts with a blast of sweet spice that is soon joined by scrumptious layers of earth, cocoa, and cedar.
